attributes.action: LET CHRIS BRADLEY (A SALE RESIDENT) BE CREATIVE AS HE LIKES ON WYTHESHAW FM
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has come to our attention that WYTHY FM are trying to oust our most famous of Sale dj's, CHRIS BRADS. Its just not on, just cos he lives in an area (SALE)which some might say compared to Wythy is the garden of eden. Come on Gordon please show your support on this one, this could get worse than the impending deflation of the pound. For the love of chris(t).

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
